verses.verse: Do we begin <S%G756><s%> <S%G5731><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to commend <S%G4921><s%> <S%G5721><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%>? or <S%G1508><s%> need we <S%G5535><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> others, epistles <S%G1992><s%> of commendation <S%G4956><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> letters of commendation <S%G4956><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>?

Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5746><s%> to <S%G3754><s%> be <S%G2075><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the epistle <S%G1992><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> ministered <S%G1247><s%> <S%G5685><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, written <S%G1449><s%> <S%G5772><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> with ink <S%G3188><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> with the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>; not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> tables <S%G4109><s%> of stone <S%G3035><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> fleshy <S%G4560><s%> tables <S%G4109><s%> of the heart <S%G2588><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> trust <S%G4006><s%> have we <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> 'Elohim-ward <S%G2316><s%>:

Not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> <S%G5748><s%> sufficient <S%G2425><s%> of <S%G575><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> to think <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5664><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sufficiency <S%G2426><s%> is of <S%G1537><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>;

Who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> hath made <S%G2427><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> able <S%G2427><s%> <S%G5656><s%> ministers <S%G1249><s%> of the new <S%G2537><s%> testament <S%G1242><s%>; not <S%G3756><s%> of the letter <S%G1121><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> of the spirit <S%G4151><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the letter <S%G1121><s%> killeth <S%G615><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> giveth life <S%G2227><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the ministration <S%G1248><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%>, written <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1121><s%> and engraven <S%G1795><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%>, was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5675><s%> glorious <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1391><s%>, so <S%G5620><s%> that the children <S%G5207><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%G2474><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5738><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> stedfastly behold <S%G816><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the face <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4383><s%> of Mosheh <S%G3475><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> countenance <S%G4383><s%>; which <S%G3588><s%> glory was to be done away <S%G2673><s%> <S%G5746><s%>:

How <S%G4459><s%> shall <S%G1248><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> the ministration <S%G1248><s%> of the spirit <S%G4151><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> <S%G1722><s%> glorious <S%G1391><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the ministration <S%G1248><s%> of condemnation <S%G2633><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%>, much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> doth the ministration <S%G1248><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> exceed <S%G4052><s%> <S%G5719><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> that which was made glorious <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5769><s%> had no <S%G3761><s%> glory <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> respect <S%G3313><s%>, by reason <S%G1752><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> that excelleth <S%G5235><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> that which is done away <S%G2673><s%> <S%G5746><s%> was glorious <S%G1223><s%> <S%G1391><s%>, much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> that which remaineth <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5723><s%> is glorious <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1391><s%>.
Seeing then <S%G3767><s%> that we have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%>, we use <S%G5530><s%> <S%G5736><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> plainness of speech <S%G3954><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G2509><s%> Mosheh <S%G3475><s%>, which put <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5707><s%> a vail <S%G2571><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> face <S%G4383><s%>, that <S%G4314><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%G2474><s%> could <S%G816><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> stedfastly look <S%G816><s%> <S%G5658><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of that which is abolished <S%G2673><s%> <S%G5746><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%> their <S%G846><s%> minds <S%G3540><s%> were blinded <S%G4456><s%> <S%G5681><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> until <S%G891><s%> this day <S%G4594><s%> remaineth <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> vail <S%G2571><s%> untaken <S%G3361><s%> away <S%G343><s%> <S%G5746><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the reading <S%G320><s%> of the old <S%G3820><s%> testament <S%G1242><s%>; which <S%G3748><s%> vail is done away <S%G2673><s%> <S%G5743><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> even <S%G2193><s%> unto this day <S%G4594><s%>, when <S%G2259><s%> Mosheh <S%G3475><s%> is read <S%G314><s%> <S%G5743><s%>, the vail <S%G2571><s%> is upon <S%G2749><s%> <S%G5736><s%> <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2259><s%> it <S%G302><s%> shall turn <S%G1994><s%> <S%G5661><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%>, the vail <S%G2571><s%> shall be taken away <S%G4014><s%> <S%G5743><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> that Spirit <S%G4151><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> is, there <S%G1563><s%> is liberty <S%G1657><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, with open <S%G343><s%> <S%G5772><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> beholding as in a glass <S%G2734><s%> <S%G5734><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%>, are changed <S%G3339><s%> <S%G5743><s%> into the same <S%G846><s%> image <S%G1504><s%> from <S%G575><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, even as <S%G2509><s%> by <S%G575><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%>.
